content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content:
Hello Mr. Wang, 

I would like to propose a price of €1,200 per month. Remember, this is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities. I am sure you will find it to be a great investment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your offer, Mr. Schmidt. I appreciate the location and the amenities of the apartment. However, I must be honest with you, the price is a bit higher than my budget. I am looking for a place that fits within my financial constraints. Would you be willing to consider a lower price?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I am willing to hear your offer. Remember, my goal is to rent out my apartment for the highest price possible. So, please, make your offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Mr. Schmidt. I am looking for a fair price that reflects the value of the apartment while also being within my budget. I would like to offer €950 per month. This is a price that I believe is reasonable and aligns with the market rates for similar apartments in the area. I hope this is a price that we can both agree upon.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, Mr. Wang, but €950 is far below my expectations. I do not want to continue the negotiation, because the offer does not meet my financial goals for this property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mr. Schmidt. I appreciate the time you've spent with me. I hope we can revisit the negotiation in the future if circumstances change. Thank you for your time. TERMINATE
name: Haoyu Wang from China
